newsitem.title: USA: Bay Networks names Rynne CFO.
newsitem.headline: Bay Networks names Rynne CFO.

text.p: Bay Networks Inc said it named David Rynne to be executive vice president and chief financial officer.
Rynne joins Bay from Tandem Computers Inc. where he was senior vice president and CFO. He joined Tandem in 1983 following an 18-year career in finance at Burroughs Corp.

Rynne is the third senior management appointment at Bay in the last two months. In November, after Chairman David House was named to the top position at the company, he recruited David Shrigley as executive vice president for sales, marketing and service. Last month, Lloyd Carney was promoted to executive vice president and general manager of the Enterprise Business Unit.
